metadata.title: CVE-2017-7869 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: GnuTLS before 2017-02-20 has an out-of-bounds write caused by an integer overflow and heap-based buffer overflow related to the cdk_pkt_read function in opencdk/read-packet.c. This issue (which is a subset of the vendor's GNUTLS-SA-2017-3 report) is fixed in 3.5.10.

criterions.comment: gnutls28 package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.5.8-5ubuntu1').
